TableField.name: SupplierID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|An automatically assigned number used to track organizations which supply goods and/or services to the organization

TableField.name: RelatedModuleID
TableField.phrase: Related Module|The name or title of the module which is associated with the supplier

ForeignField.name: RelatedModule
ForeignField.phrase: Related Module|The name or title of the module which is associated with the supplier

TableField.name: RelatedRecordID
TableField.phrase: Related Record|The unique ID of the related record within the related module

DynamicForeignField.name: RelatedRecordDescription
DynamicForeignField.phrase: Related Record Description|A description of the related record based on a combination of field values assigned from within the related module
DynamicForeignField.sample: 3M 3710 Dust Mask; Respirator; Minnesota Mining and Manufacturing; 3710

TableField.name: SupplierTypeID
TableField.phrase: Supplier Type|A combined field used to describe this supplier type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: SupplierCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Category|A method for grouping suppliers of similar characteristics

CodeField.name: SupplierCategory
CodeField.phrase: Category|A method for grouping suppliers of similar characteristics

ForeignField.name: SupplierTypeTitle
ForeignField.phrase: Type|A title or phrase used to describe a specific type of supplier

ForeignField.name: SupplierTypeDesc
ForeignField.phrase: Description|A brief but thorough description of the specific type of supplier exposure
ForeignField.sample: Suppliers engaged in providing services to reduce operational loss

ForeignField.name: SupplierType
ForeignField.phrase: Supplier Type|A combined field used to describe this supplier type when associating it with other records

TableField.name: SupplierOrgID
TableField.phrase: Supplier|The name of the supplier

RemoteField.name: SupplierContactID
RemoteField.phrase: Supplier Contact|The name of the individual working for the supplier which is responsible for maintaining the customer relationship with the specified organization

ForeignField.name: ContactCard
ForeignField.phrase: Contact Card|A combined field used to group basic contact information of a person

ForeignField.name: SupplierContact
ForeignField.phrase: Supplier Contact|The name of the individual working for the supplier which is responsible for maintaining the customer relationship with the specified organization

TableField.name: PrimarySupplier
TableField.phrase: Primary Supplier|Whether this supplier is the primary supplier of the goods and/or services

TableField.name: SupplierTitle
TableField.phrase: Supplier Title|A word or short phrase used to identify the supplier and/or the supplier relationship with the organization

TableField.name: ItemDescription
TableField.phrase: Item Description|A brief but thorough description of the item supplied by the supplier
TableField.sample: The supplier supplies raw strawberries for use in the strawberry swirl ice cream.

TableField.name: RelationshipID
TableField.phrase: Relationship|Whether the supplier is internal to the organization, external to the organization, or a subordinate relationship (e.g. sub-contractor)

CodeField.name: Relationship
CodeField.phrase: Category|A method for grouping suppliers of similar characteristics

TableField.name: SupplierRelationship
TableField.phrase: Relationship|Whether this supplier is internal to the organization required to furnish a Certificate of Product Liability

TableField.name: ProductLiabilityCertificate
TableField.phrase: Liability Certificate|Whether this supplier is required to furnish a Certificate of Product Liability

TableField.name: LiabilityExpiration
TableField.phrase: Certificate Expiration|Date the Product Liability Certificate will expire

TableField.name: OrganizationID
TableField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization which utilizes the supplier to purchase the related item

ForeignField.name: Organization
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization which utilzes the supplier to purchase the related item

RemoteField.name: PersonAccountableID
RemoteField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing the supplier relationship between the specified organization and the specified supplier

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing the supplier relationship between the specified organization and the specified supplier

TableField.name: CatalogID
TableField.phrase: Catalog|A description of the catalog based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Catalogs module

ForeignField.name: CatalogTypeID
ForeignField.phrase: Catalog Type|The type of catalog used by the organization for the purchase of goods and/or services

CodeField.name: CatalogType
CodeField.phrase: Catalog Type|The type of catalog used by the organization for the purchase of goods and/or services

ForeignField.name: Catalog
ForeignField.phrase: Catalog|A description of the catalog based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Catalogs module
ForeignField.sample: Vallen 2004 Industrial Safety Supply Catalog; Vallen Safety Supply Company, Inc.; 423; 09-28-2003; Out of date

TableField.name: CatalogPgNo
TableField.phrase: Catalog Page Number|The page number of the supplier's current catalog where the equipment can be found

TableField.name: PartNo
TableField.phrase: Part Number|The part number assigned to the equipment by the equipment supplier

TableField.name: ItemURL
TableField.phrase: Internet Link|A link to the supplier's website where the item can be reviewed

TableField.name: UnitCost
TableField.phrase: Unit Cost|The price charged by the supplier for the equipment based on the supplier's price per base unit

TableField.name: BaseUnitID
TableField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: BaseUnitCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Base Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

CodeField.name: BaseUnitCategory
CodeField.phrase: Base Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

ForeignField.name: BaseUnit
ForeignField.phrase: Base Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

TableField.name: MinimumUnitOrder
TableField.phrase: Minimum Unit Order|The minimum number of equipment units required to be purchased to receive the unit cost

TableField.name: MinimumOrderUoMID
TableField.phrase: Minimum Order Units|The units of measure associated with the supplier's minimum order level requirements

ForeignField.name: MinimumOrderCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Minimum Order Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

CodeField.name: MinimumOrderCategory
CodeField.phrase: Minimum Order Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

ForeignField.name: MinimumOrderUoM
ForeignField.phrase: Minimum Order Units|The units of measure associated with the supplier's minimum order level requirements

SummaryField.name: TotalEstExp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Exposure|The total estimated cost exposure associated with the supplier

SummaryField.name: TotalEstOpp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Opportunity|The total estimated financial opportunity associated with the supplier

CombinedField.name: CatalogListing
CombinedField.phrase: Catalog Listing|The catalog page number(s) where the item is listed
CombinedField.sample: Vallen Safety Supply Company, Inc. pp.24-25

CombinedField.name: CostPerUnit
CombinedField.phrase: Cost Per Unit|A combined field used to describe the cost per unit when associating it with other records
CombinedField.sample: Vallen Safety Supply Company, Inc.; Safety Equipment; Active Agenda, HQ

CombinedField.name: MinimumOrder
CombinedField.phrase: Minimum Unit Order|A combined field used to describe the minimum unit order when associating it with other records
CombinedField.sample: Vallen Safety Supply Company, Inc.; Safety Equipment; Active Agenda, HQ

LinkField.name: RelatedRecordLink
LinkField.phrase: Related Record Link|An internal link to the related record.

CombinedField.name: RelatedModuleRecord
CombinedField.phrase: Related Record|A combined field used to display the related module name and record ID

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: Supplier
CombinedField.phrase: Supplier|A combined field used to describe this supplier when associating it with other records
CombinedField.sample: Vallen Safety Supply Company, Inc.; Safety Equipment; Active Agenda, HQ

ListScreen.name: List
ListScreen.phrase: List|List suppliers associated with related records

SearchScreen.name: Search
SearchScreen.phrase: Search|Search suppliers associated with related records

SampleItem.name: 2004 Industrial Safety Supply Catalog; Vallen Safety Supply Company, Inc.; 09-28-2003; Out of date
Grainger Supply Catalog; Grainger, Inc.; 09-28-2003; Current [non-exclusive]
Zee Medical 2004 Safety Catalog; Zee Medical, Inc.; 09-28-2003; Current [exclusive]

ViewScreen.name: View
ViewScreen.phrase: View|View summary information about a supplier associated with a related record

EditScreen.name: Form
EditScreen.phrase: Form|Edit summary information about a supplier associated with a related record

SampleItem.name: 2004 Industrial Safety Supply Catalog; Vallen Safety Supply Company, Inc.; 09-28-2003; Out of date
Grainger Supply Catalog; Grainger, Inc.; 09-28-2003; Current [non-exclusive]
Zee Medical 2004 Safety Catalog; Zee Medical, Inc.; 09-28-2003; Current [exclusive]

EditScreen.name: AssetProtection
EditScreen.phrase: Audits|Associate audit items with the supplier

EditScreen.name: Agreements
EditScreen.phrase: Agreements|Associate business agreements and/or contracts with the supplier

EditScreen.name: Exposures
EditScreen.phrase: Exposures|Associate cost exposures with the supplier

EditScreen.name: Opportunities
EditScreen.phrase: Opportunities|Associate financial opportunities with the supplier

EditScreen.name: BusinessConsequences
EditScreen.phrase: Consequences|Associate business consequences with the supplier

EditScreen.name: PackagingEquivalents
EditScreen.phrase: Equivalents|Associate a supplier with equivalent packaging units

EditScreen.name: Accountability
EditScreen.phrase: Accountability|Associate participants with ongoing accountabilities for the supplier

EditScreen.name: Involvement
EditScreen.phrase: Involvement|Associate participants involved with the supplier

EditScreen.name: FileRetention
EditScreen.phrase: Files|Associate physical files and retention methods with the supplier

EditScreen.name: BestPractices
EditScreen.phrase: Best Practices|Associate best practices with the supplier

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
